mapper.select: SELECT a.id, CONCAT(a.asset_name, '(', a.asset_num, ')') `name`, a.specifications specificationsName, a.asset_num assetNum FROM asset_management a WHERE a.type_id = #{typeId} AND a.employee_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT into asset_management_return (id, title, odd_number, state, process_instance_id, remark, enclosure_info, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{oddNumber}, #{state}, #{processInstanceId}, #{remark}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{createId}, #{createTime})

insert into asset_management_return_goods (id, return_id, type_id, management_id, management_name, specifications, asset_num, remark, state) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.returnId}, #{item.typeId}, #{item.assetId}, #{item.assetName}, #{item.specificationsName}, #{item.assetNum}, #{item.remark}, #{item.state})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumber, a.remark, a.state, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo, IFNULL(a.process_instance_id,'') processInstanceId, b.user_name userName FROM asset_management_return a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.management_name assetName, c.specifications specificationsName, b.type_name typeName, a.asset_num assetNum, a.remark, a.state, CASE a.state WHEN '0' THEN '未提交审批' WHEN '1' THEN '等待审批' WHEN '2' THEN '审批通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审批不通过' END stateName FROM asset_management_return_goods a LEFT JOIN asset_management_type b ON a.type_id = b.id LEFT JOIN asset_management c ON a.management_id = c.id WHERE a.return_id = #{returnId}

SELECT a.id, a.create_id createId, GROUP_CONCAT(b.management_id) managementId FROM asset_management_return a, asset_management_return_goods b WHERE a.process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId} AND a.id = b.return_id AND a.state = '1'

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumver, a.remark, a.state, b.user_name userName, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo FROM asset_management_return a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.management_id assetId, c.specifications specificationsName, a.type_id typeId, a.asset_num assetNum, a.remark FROM asset_management_return_goods a LEFT JOIN asset_management c ON a.management_id = c.id WHERE a.return_id = #{id}
SELECT a.id FROM asset_management_return a WHERE a.process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId}
